a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: This concert looks kind of weird.

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: It looks more like one of those heretical places of worship than a concert in Gensokyo.

a2.speaker: Reimu:
a2.dialogue: Now, we have gotten closer to the culprit of this incident, so... am I ready to beat some pagan creeps again?

a3.speaker: Jane:
a3.dialogue: Hey! I heard you making some obnoxious noises outside and you're hogging my stage!

a4.speaker: Reimu:
a4.dialogue: Who cares? You are one of those people who cause trouble to my land! Why don't you pay a visit to the Scarlet Devil?

a5.speaker: Jane:
a5.dialogue: Oh my, what have you just said!?

a7.speaker: Jane:
a7.dialogue: Me the Angel of Music shall not be fallen by the blasphemous rhetoric uttered from your impure mouths!

a8.speaker: Jane:
a8.dialogue: I deserve to sing the most angelic of melodies in praise of the Almighty!

a9.speaker: Jane:
a9.dialogue: Now, join me in the Holy Church through my sweetest of melodies, those who need repentance... like you!
